page.title: 14FARMS AND FARMING
page.content:
We did a survey on farming and
we rang up 14 people to ask them some questions to find out for example how old the farm is. Here are the averages. The average age of the farm was 194 years. The average age of the farm house itself was 253 years. The oldest house was 535 years old. For how many cows they had the average was 107. 2 people kept pigs: 1 had 3 and the other 90. The beef cattle was really high because 1 person had 1000 bulls and the average turned out to be 322. On the crops 2 people kept it all for animals and 1 person sold it all. 3 people kept most of it. 4 people had barley, 4 people had wheat and 2 people had oats. The biggest farm is 350 acres, and the average was 138 acres.
